declined-desc: You declined a booking request from <1>{{nickname}}</1> for their <3>{{cats}}</3> during the dates of <5>{{startDate}}</5> until <7>{{endDate}}</7>.
canceled-desc: A booking request from <1>{{nickname}}</1> for their <3>{{cats}}</3> during the dates of <5>{{startDate}}</5> until <7>{{endDate}}</7> got canceled due to no answer from you within 3 days time.
other-history: You hosted <1>{{nickname}}'s</1> cat(s) during the dates of <3>{{startDate}}</3> until <5>{{endDate}}</5>.
